scripts.build-gulp: cd gulp && npm run clean && pnpm install && npm run build
scripts.build-svelte: cd svelte && npm run clean && pnpm install && npm run build && npm run check
scripts.build-dapp: rm -rf dapp/build && npm run build-gulp && npm run build-svelte
scripts.build-wordpress: cd wordpress && npm run clean && pnpm install && npm run instal && npm run build && npm run check
scripts.build: npm run build-wordpress && npm run build-dapp
